bibl.title: Papyri editae in memoriam Wm. Brashear I.
bibl.note: 1. Inv. G 5148. Genesis 36.11-13 & 18-19. Provenance unknown, Fifth/sixth century. - 2. Inv. G. 5144 recto. Accounts from Oxyrhynchus: Expenditures. Oxyrhynchus, Sixth century. - 3. Inv. G 5144 verso. Accounts from Oxyrhynchus: Receipts. Oxyrhynchus, Sixth/seventh century.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Heid. Inv. G 5144 recto; 5144 verso; 5148
AST Rodney, Papyri editae in memoriam Wm. Brashear I.

1. Inv. G 5148. Genesis 36.11-13 & 18-19. Provenance unknown, Fifth/sixth century. - 2. Inv. G. 5144 recto. Accounts from Oxyrhynchus: Expenditures. Oxyrhynchus, Sixth century. - 3. Inv. G 5144 verso. Accounts from Oxyrhynchus: Receipts. Oxyrhynchus, Sixth/seventh century.
